amendment.description: To require reports on the Federal Air Marshals program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3634 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3634 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9194-9195; text: CR S9194) To require reports on the Federal Air Marshals program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3634 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3634 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Boxer.
